mapper.select:
select
from c_organization where
pid = #{pCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
pid is null
and (code like 'region_%' or code like 'beijing%')

select a.id as pid, a.name as pname, b.id as cid, b.name as cname from c_organization a left outer join c_organization b on a.id = b.pid where a.pid is null and (a.code like 'region_%' or a.code like 'beijing%'/* or a.code like 'agent' */or a.code like 'finance' or a.code like 'business' or a.code like 'market') order by pid asc

SELECT t.id as pid, t.name as pname, cb.id as cid , cb.name as cname FROM c_organization t left join c_user cu on cu.organization_id = t.id left join c_organization cb on t.id = cb.pid where cu.id = #{userId} /* union SELECT t.id, t.name, cb.pid, cb.name FROM c_organization t left join c_organization cb on t.id = cb.pid where t.code like 'agent'*/
SELECT C.ID,C.NAME FROM C_ORGANIZATION C WHERE regexp_like (C.CODE, '[a-z|A-Z]+_+[a-z|A-Z]+_+')

select a.id, a.name from c_organization a where ( a.code like 'beijing' or a.code like 'finance' or a.code like 'business' or a.code like 'market')
or a.id in ( #{org} )
order by pid asc

select id,name from(
SELECT ca.id as id,ca.name as name FROM c_organization ca left join c_organization cb on cb.id = ca.pid left join c_organization cc on cc.id = cb.pid where ca.id = #{org} union SELECT cb.id as id,cb.name as name FROM c_organization ca left join c_organization cb on cb.id = ca.pid left join c_organization cc on cc.id = cb.pid where ca.id = #{org} union SELECT cc.id as id,cc.name as name FROM c_organization ca left join c_organization cb on cb.id = ca.pid left join c_organization cc on cc.id = cb.pid where ca.id = #{org} ) where id is not null group by id,name order by id

select id from(
select distinct cc.id from c_organization ca left join c_organization cb on ca.id = cb.pid left join c_organization cc on cb.id = cc.pid where ca.id = #{org} union select distinct cb.id from c_organization ca left join c_organization cb on ca.id = cb.pid where ca.id = #{org} union select distinct ca.id from c_organization ca where ca.id = #{org} ) where id is not null order by id desc

select a.id, a.name from c_organization a where (a.code like 'region_%' or a.code like 'beijing%' or a.code like 'finance' or a.code like 'business' or a.code like 'market') group by a.id, a.name order by id desc
